It's good game that has its authenticity ruined by gratuitous childish swearing. For me, swearing is for those with a limited vocabulary and children out to shock their parents. It's got no place in game set before such language existed. Swearing is easier to write than meaningful dialogue, so it saves on money. Instead of hiring decent writers who can put emotions into to words it's cheaper to hire second rate writers such as those in this game. It's A pity that the devs did not have courage of their convictions and produce a well written script.
I always come back for at least a few matches.
